question: ####[UFAQ 24](https://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Reign_and_Reverie_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs] Is the Corp allowed to place 0 advancement tokens on a card and still force the Runner to either access that card or pay 3?

text_ruling:
If the Runner runs HQ or R&D, accesses a card during the run due to [Otoroshi](/en/card/22038), and then the run ends unsuccessfully, can they still claim 1[c] from [Zahya Sadeghi](/en/card/30010)'s ability?
>Yes, the card accessed would still count. *Zahya*â€™s ability does not require a successful run.
